alert.note: Alert for Carter; Garvin; Murray; Pontotoc (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 3:24PM CDT until March 16 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR EASTERN GARVIN...NORTHWESTERN CARTER...WESTERN PONTOTOC AND NORTHERN MURRAY COUNTIES... At 324 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pauls Valley to near Wynnewood to 6 miles west of Davis, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pauls Valley, Sulphur, Davis, Wynnewood, Stratford, Roff, Katie, Fitzhugh, Hickory, Hennepin, Scullin and Vanoss. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
